titleStmt.title: Christ's power over bodily diseases Preached in several sermons on Mat. 8. 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 10, 11, 12, 13. And published for the instruction especially of the more ignorant people in the great dutie of preparation for sickness and death. By Edward Lawrence, M.A. minister of the gospel at Baschurch in the county of Salop.
titleStmt.author: Lawrence, Edward, 1623-1695.
Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by J.C. for Francis Tyton at the three Daggers in Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: "To the reader" is signed: Richard Baxter.
Reproduction of the original in the Congregational Library, London.
